alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:21AM EST until February 19 at 8:30PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. Saint Marys River at St. Mary`s River near Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Wabash, Huntington, Blackford, Wells and Jay Counties. Wabash River at Wabash affecting Cass IN, Miami and Wabash Counties. Auglaize River near Defiance affecting Defiance County. Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties. Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Little River above Huntington affecting Wabash, Allen IN and Huntington Counties. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Miami, Wabash, Whitley and Kosciusko Counties. Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County. Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Spy Run Creek at Spy Run Creek near Park Drive At Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. .These river rises will shift ice within the river and could lead to ice jams. This forecast is based on unobstructed flow and does not factor additional rises associated with ice jams. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding of lowland and farmland near the river increases. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 13.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
